alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lafayette; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Iberia, southeastern Lafayette and west central St. Martin Parishes through 1145 AM CDT... At 1115 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Broussard, or near Lafayette, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Catahoula, Scott, Breaux Bridge, Carencro, St. Martinville, Broussard, Youngsville, Cade and Parks. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 98 and 108. Interstate 49 near mile marker 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
